
set(STRATA_BUILD_WRAPPERS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(STRATA_PACKAGES_AUTO_DETECT OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(STRATA_BUILD_WARNINGS_AS_ERRORS OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(STRATA_TARGET_ANALYZE OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(STRATA_TARGET_FORMAT OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)

set(STRATA_CONNECTION_LIBUSB OFF CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)

add_subdirectory(strata EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL)

set(AVIAN_BUILD_STATIC OFF)

add_subdirectory(lib_avian)
